statement.p: Mika is conducting market research on the cost of a private helicopter tour. Mika has determined that the average cost of a private helicopter tour is 840, and that the distribution of costs is normally distributed with a standard deviation of 115.
a. Find the probability that a single randomly selected consumer spends more than 940 on a private helicopter tour.
b. The cost of the middle 60 of private helicopter tours falls between (round to the nearest dollar):
c. The most expensive 9 of private helicopter tours cost at least how much? (round to the nearest dollar)
